Guys, even if Ryo couldn't hear the red alert at the CF, the battle 
would be easily detectable on scanners.



::Zardus/Dark Lavacons/Repressor/FZ/Perndabot/Kluster/Proto/Grimmler::

Zardus frowns, hearing Punch's transmission and looking down at his 
wrist comp. There was indeed a possible attack on the Cybertronian 
Fire. He opens his comm to Sharpedge, since the bot was in charge of 
Deemos' group at the moment.

"Sharpedge," he says into the device, "Redirect your troops to the 
Cybertronian Fire. There's going to be an attack on it. Other Alliance 
members are on their way."

Zardus contacts the Lavacons, telling them to engage the Cybertronian 
Fire.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Astral arrives at the scene after the chase takes off, looking around 
at his team. Fenox was getting to her feet.

"Allright, what's the situation?" He asks her. Fenox explains about 
the battle.

Astral nods, recieves Zardus' message. "We're gonna follow them then," 
he says to his group and powers up his boosters, "We're attacking the 
Cybertronian Fire."

The Lavacons fly off toward the Cybertronian Fire, except for 
Recklessa, who was fighting Rex.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot frowns, watching the short battle and then the chase. He 
powers up his jetpack and flies after them. His missile launcher was 
ready to kill.

Perndabot smiles. He loved battle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rex dodges under a shot from Recklessa, firing back. Recklessa dives 
under the shot, seeing her team flying off toward the Cybertronian 
Fire.

"Gotta run, see ya!" Recklessa says to Rex as she takes off after 
them. The Maximal growls and follows after, firing and mostly missing.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ takes off after Dark One and SixShot, his jetpack on full burn. He 
activates his comm.

"Be careful when we reach the Cybertronian Fire. Feline gave us the 
information on the defences, and they're fairly strong," he tells the 
rest of the Alliance members there, sending them a summary of what 
Feline had collected (Weapons: EMP batteries, laser batteries, missile 
launchers).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Proto runs out of the Cybertronian Fire and flies up. The shields 
blink for a second to let him through, and he takes off toward the 
chase.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler spinns around as he recieves the transmission.

"Let's go, battle time!" He says to SlashStrike, exiting the 
Cybertronian Fire and arming his rifle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster runs to the bridge, sitting down at one of the comps.

"What's the situation?" He asks Chordate.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Punch/Nemesis Enforcer/Unitron/Scattershot:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Punch looked at the scanners, seeing the chase after Windlord made 
by his 
> comrades.  He also noticed they were heading for the Cybertronian 
Fire.
> He opened up a comm. link to three people.
> 
> "This is Punch, possible attack on the Cybertronian Fire.  Nemesis, 
Unitron, 
> and Scattershot, you can fly, so you can get there fastest.  Head 
there 
> immediately." Punch ended the link as the three robots responded by 
taki
